forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 7C.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain at times. Lows overnight in the mid 40s.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 7C. Winds SE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning then continued cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 30%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning then continued cloudy and windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 30%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with thunderstorms by morning. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then cloudy with rain likely overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 10C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 38F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 48F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
